headline: Broadcom Inc. (AVGO) CEO Tan Hock E. Sells 100,000 Shares for About $34 Million
summary: Broadcom Inc. (NASDAQ:AVGO) is one of the 14 Stocks That Will Double in the Next 5 Years. On September 25, 2025, CEO Tan Hock E. sold 100,000 shares of Broadcom Inc. (NASDAQ:AVGO) for about $34 million. Despite this executive liquidity, Broadcom maintains a $1.58 trillion market valuation and industry-leading 77% gross profit margins. headline: AI-Fixated Traders Pile Into Teradyne, Other Obscure Chip Stocks
summary: Teradyne Inc., a provider of tools used for testing chips during the manufacturing process, has nearly doubled from an April low and is up more than 40% since late July.  Meanwhile, Lam Research Corp. and KLA Corp. — two of the biggest US makers of machines used to produce semiconductors — are the fourth- and sixth-best performing stocks, respectively, in the 30-member Philadelphia Stock Exchange Semiconductor Index this year with gains of more than 68%.

raw.headline: AI-Fixated Traders Pile Into Teradyne, Other Obscure Chip Stocks
